data.description:
Welcome to the beautiful world of DeoVR videos. Our world-class VR video player works seamlessly with all popular headsets. DeoVR combines intuitive design with the very latest features, showcasing the power of virtual reality at its very best. 

Other VR players don’t come close. Here’s why:
More advanced features than any other player: passthrough, haptics, loops, playback speed, build-your-own-journey, subtitles, and much more!
Regular updates to keep you at the cutting edge of VR tech
Hub for the world’s best VR content, including thousands of free VR videos
True-to-life visuals, capable of all resolutions and formats (180°/360°/2D/3D/8K/fisheye & more!)
User-friendly: play content with a single click, automatically chooses correct settings
Playback supports DLNA, web streaming, AND local files
Completely customizable: adjust every element for your unique preferences
Player is free for all users

deovr.com
Forum: forum.deovr.com
Blog: deovr.com/blog
Send any questions or feedback to support@deovr.com. We’d love to hear from you.

changelog.change_log:
New features:
  - Added views count on thumbnails.
  - Added Sandbox filter for videos.
  - Added Startup URL setting.
Improvements:
  - Quest 3 now preserves refresh rate between app restarts.
  - Meta account linking.
  - UI adjustments.
Bugfixes:
  - All resolutions now work with Oculus Link.
